nodes.text: The Horthav system was a star system located in the Kuat sector of the Core Worlds. It contained the planet Horthav.
The Horthav system was a largely uninhabited star system. It was located just 23 minutes away from the Kuat system.
The Horthav system served as one of two main staging areas for freighters heading to the Kuat Freight Port.
In 8.5 ABY, during the campaigns after Zsinj's death, the New Republic sent a large fleet of Mon Calamari Star Cruisers to the Horthav system in preparation for the Taking of Kuat.
